description:
Nishiki Ikumatsu is the owner of a ramen shop called Hokuto Shinken (北斗心軒). She and her husband, http://anidb.net/ch17029 [Daigo] intended to turn the ramen shop into the best in Edo, but her husband died due to http://anidb.net/ch6222 [Jouishishi]`s terrorist activities before they could do it, as a result of which she holds a deep grudge against Jouishishi members. http://anidb.net/ch1165 [Katsura Kotarou] worked at her ramen shop when he was injured and on the run from http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi]. He helped to rescue her when her brother-in-law betrayed her.
Although she now knows that he is a Jouishishi member, they are on friendly terms. http://anidb.net/ch1165 [Katsura]`s subsequent television interview by http://anidb.net/ch17094 [Hanano Saki] was carried out at her ramen shop.
http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki] is known to be a frequent customer, and he would patronize her shop every time he gets some money from his jobs.
name: Nishiki Ikumatsu
